name: Cline Bot
description: Open-source autonomous coding agent for VS Code with model-agnostic design, MCP integration, and human-in-the-loop approval, trusted by 4M+ developers worldwide.

zh-Hans.description: VS Code 的开源自主编码智能体,模型无关设计、MCP 集成和人机协作审批,受到全球 400 万以上开发者信赖。

de.description: Open-Source autonomer Codierungs-Agent für VS Code mit modell-agnostischem Design, MCP-Integration und menschlicher Genehmigungsschleife.
